title: Emotional Design Strategies in Multimedia Learning: Science Class Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations in Pedagogy, Science Subject Matter Knowledge, and Experience with Multimedia Tools
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers practice designing and evaluating emotion-based multimedia materials for elementary science classes, utilizing smartphone-based authoring tools and low-cost visual elements

learning_goals: Learners can create at least two types of science multimedia materials applying emotional design principles (color, shape, anthropomorphism)
Learners can comparatively analyze emotion design strategies based on prior knowledge levels and apply them contextually to educational settings
Learners can peer-evaluate created materials and measure learning transfer effects and cognitive load indicators

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
